page.page_body:
SENSE actively collaborates with a number of industrial and academic partners. Feel free to contact us for more information.
Current Collaborators
CIS Research Group - - Athens University of Economics and Business
DB-net - Athens University of Economics and Business
Software Engineering Lab - University of Mons-Hainaut
LORE / Lab On REengineering - University of Antwerp
Singular S.A.
